title: (x) "Grenaa Bilhu AS" techno sans logo - Handel Gothic {Niall Moran}
content:
Thanks a bunch people!

author: henriko

comments.content:
Na… The R on Handel Gothic doesn’t have a straight arm. Handel is also a little too narrow. Below is Handel (edit: Handel Gothic D Bold) stretched to 126%.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/grenaa_3536.gif)

Something Bauhaus (obviously swiss…)

M

‘ [Simian](http://web.archive.org/web/20070307165254/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=24&subpage=viewfonts)’, from House Industries?

Edit-A-Bit: Nah, Simian is slightly different as well, but, [the Bitstream version of ‘Handel Gothic’](http://web.archive.org/web/20070307165254/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/handel-gothic/) DOES have a straight legged ‘R’.

Dav
Yep, formlos is right, it is the bitstream version of handel
